delete.summary: This endpoint allows to unbook a slot
delete.description:
to unbook you must provide

  • the booking_reference : the ID provided to book the slot (basket_id or order_id)
    or
  • the confirmation_reference : the ID provided to confirm the booking (order_id)

get.summary: Retrieve the list of slots of one or several stores
get.description:
Retrieve the list of slots of one or several stores
between the start date and the end date
having the given statuts or all slots regardless of the status if no status is selected

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: The service identifier of the store to which the slot belongs (this is the meti service ID)

parameters.name: start_datetime
parameters.description:
This is the beginning of the time range to return slots
if start_datetime is not provided default value will be today at 00:00:00
end_datetime must be present if start_datetime is present

parameters.name: end_datetime
parameters.description:
This is the end of the time range to return slots
if end_datetime is not provided default value will be

  • 5 next days for drive
  • 7 next days for LAD.

end_datetime must be present if start_datetime is present.

the difference between start_datetime and end_datetime should be below than 20 days
otherwise end_datetime will be ignored and the response will be the list of slots
between start_datetime and start_datetime + 20 days

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of slots. default return all slots regardless of the status

parameters.name: x-correlation-id
parameters.description: This is the correlation id that can be used to link several API requests together

X-Correlation-ID.description: This is the correlation id that can be used to link several API requests together

api_key.description:
Standard Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Value example: "Bearer {token}"
api_key.name: Authorization

message.description: response message, when we need more details than the code.

book_slot_response.title: book_slot_response
book_slot_response.description: The request object needed to book a slot

confirmation_reference.description: An ID that can be used after to unbook the slot if needed. Usually this is the order_id

service_id.description: The service identifier of the store to which the slot belongs (this is the meti service ID)

confirm_slot_request.title: confirm_slot_request
confirm_slot_request.description: The request object needed to confirm a slot

response_code.title: response_code
response_code.description: A list of possible response code used to success or error

message.description: response message, when we need more details than the code.

error_response.title: error_response
error_response.description: base response format containing code and message

slot_status.title: slot_status
slot_status.description:
The list of possible slot status 
  - OPEN : when booking is possible 
 - CLOSED : when slot is CLOSED by shop, although the max capacity is not reached  
 - FULL :  when the day capacity or the slot capacity is reached  
 When slot has the CLOSED or FULL status booking is no longer available

booking_reference.description: this is the basket_id or order_id used to book or confirm the slot

service_id.description: The service identifier of the store to which the slot belongs (this is the meti service ID)

book_slot_request.title: book_slot_request
book_slot_request.description: The request object needed to book a slot

begin_datetime.description: This is the slot beginning date and time

cut_off.description: Date and time before the slot become unavailable

end_datetime.description: This is the slot ending date and time

maximum_capacity.description: This is the maximum slot capacity (number of baskets/orders)

maximum_day_capacity.description: It's the maximum capacity of the day defined by the shop

reference_round.description: Day ref (1 for monday, 2 for tuesday, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7) + round ref (001, 002, 003, nn) + Week type (A, B, C, x). ! will be available into V2 version

service_id.description: The service identifier of the store to which the slot belongs

id.description: This is the identifier of the slot

stock_range.description: concatenation between the day of preparation and 1A, 1B, 2A, 2B, 3A, 3B, 4A, 4B, 5A, 5B ...! will be available into V2 version

used_capacity.description: This is the number of baskets/orders already affected to this slot

used_day_capacity.description: Total number of baskets/orders on all the slots of the day

message.description: response message, when we need more details than the code.

slot_action_response.title: slot_action_response
slot_action_response.description: a base response format containing code and messag
